entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as feeling happier than ever after his achievement in the Quidditch match. He is also mentioned to be a famous name, but has now done something to be proud of.

entities.name: nimbus two thousand
entities.description: Nimbus Two Thousand is described as Harry's broom, which he takes back to the broomshed after the match.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being in the distance, jumping up and down and cheering through a nosebleed.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being in the distance with Ron, jumping up and down and celebrating Harry's victory.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone that Harry has shown his achievement to.

relationships.description: Harry owns the Nimbus Two Thousand broom.
Harry and Ron are friends, as they are mentioned together in the distance celebrating Harry's victory.
Harry and Hermione are friends, as they are mentioned together in the distance celebrating Harry's victory.
Harry has shown his achievement to Snape.
